Menu

Welcome to the flavour of Silas Cove, where the sea breeze inspires every bite and sip.

Our menu is a celebration of the coast: fresh, vibrant, and made to be savoured. From laid-back lunches on the terrace to indulgent dinners under the fairy lights, we've crafted something for every appetite and occasion.

Whether you're craving our signature seafood platter, a perfectly grilled steak, or one of our famous wood-fired pizzas, we've got you covered. And don't forget to explore our handpicked wine list and creative cocktails, best enjoyed with a sea view and good company.

Dive in and discover your new favourites.
